column1: #Text=Aang says : " Wait 'til you see it , Katara !
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's why I 'm so excited !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's just that ... a lot can change in all that time .
#Text=" Aang says : " I know , but I need to see it for myself .
#Text=There 's a prickle snake in your sleeping bag !
